name: TinkerTowers
description:
Use your building aptitude and rubber band shooting skills to win the day in TinkerTowers!

TinkerTowers is a lighthearted build and shoot game.  You find a flat spot in your area to claim it as your own.  Then you purchase ammunition and build your tower around your treasure room. After that, you try to shoot the other players' treasure rooms inside their towers.  You earn extra coins for hitting treasure rooms and destroying blocks. The player with the last treasure room standing wins the round and the best out of 3 wins the game!

For best results, please download for Mac or Windows. 

TinkerTowers is meant to be a shared Augmented Reality shooter for iOS and other AR-friendly devices.  Unfortunately, laptops generally aren't AR friendly, so this version demonstrates the concept for the full version as a mock up of a typical game space. A living room, which will have automated enemies shooting at your tower.  Just like in the AR version, once a treasure room is destroyed in a tower, that tower owner is out of the game.
